Package me.agno.gridjavacore.columns

Interface ISortableColumn<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of data in the column
All Superinterfaces:
IColumn<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
IGridColumn<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridCoreColumn
public interface ISortableColumn<T> extends IColumn<T>
Represents a sortable column in a grid.

  • Method Details

    • getOrderers

      List<IColumnOrderer<T>> getOrderers()
      Returns the list of column orderers for this sortable column. The column orderers determine the order in which the column's data is sorted.
      Returns:
      the list of column orderers

    • isColumnSortDefined

      boolean isColumnSortDefined()
      Checks if the column has a defined sort order.
      Returns:
      true if the column sort order is defined, false otherwise

    • isSortEnabled

      boolean isSortEnabled()
      Determines if sorting is enabled for the column.
      Returns:
      true if sorting is enabled, false otherwise

    • getSortMode

      GridSortMode getSortMode()
      Retrieves the sort mode of the grid column.
      Returns:
      the sort mode of the column

    • isSorted

      boolean isSorted()
      Checks if the column's data is sorted.
      Returns:
      true if the column's data is sorted, false otherwise

    • setSorted

      void setSorted(boolean sorted)
      Sets the sorted state of the column.
      Parameters:
      sorted - true if the column's data is sorted, false otherwise

    • getDirection

      Optional<GridSortDirection> getDirection()
      Retrieves the sorting direction of the grid column.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the sorting direction of the grid column if it is defined, or an empty Optional if it is not defined

    • setDirection

      void setDirection(GridSortDirection direction)
      Sets the sorting direction for the grid column.
      Parameters:
      direction - the sorting direction of the grid column

    • getInitialDirection

      Optional<GridSortDirection> getInitialDirection()
      Retrieves the initial sorting direction for the grid column.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the initial sorting direction of the grid column if it is defined, or an empty Optional if it is not defined

    • setInitialDirection

      void setInitialDirection(GridSortDirection initialDirection)
      Sets the initial sorting direction for the grid column.
      Parameters:
      initialDirection - the initial sorting direction of the grid column

    • sortable

      IGridColumn<T> sortable(boolean sort)
      Defines whether a column is sortable.
      Parameters:
      sort - true if the column should be sortable, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the instance of the grid column

    • sortable

      IGridColumn<T> sortable(boolean sort, GridSortMode gridSortMode)
      Sets the sortable property of the grid column with the specified sort mode.
      Parameters:
      sort - true to enable sorting, false otherwise
      gridSortMode - the sort mode of the grid column (THREE_STATE or TWO_STATE)
      Returns:
      the updated IGridColumn instance

    • sortInitialDirection

      IGridColumn<T> sortInitialDirection(GridSortDirection direction)
      Sets the initial sorting direction for the grid column.
      Parameters:
      direction - the initial sorting direction of the grid column
      Returns:
      the updated IGridColumn instance

    • thenSortBy

      IGridColumn<T> thenSortBy(String expression)
      Sets the sorting expression for the grid column and returns the instance of the grid column.
      Parameters:
      expression - the sorting expression for the grid column
      Returns:
      the instance of the grid column

    • thenSortByDescending

      IGridColumn<T> thenSortByDescending(String expression)
      Sorts the grid column in descending order based on the given sorting expression.
      Parameters:
      expression - the sorting expression for the grid column
      Returns:
      the instance of the grid column after sorting in descending order
